title: X-Men: Legacy - Divided He Stands (Trade Paperback)
description:
No more X-Men. In the wake of Messiah CompleX, mutantkind lies in ruin. Gravely injured, Professor X appears sidelined. Will he abandon his dream for peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants? With the future of mutantkind in flux, how far will he go to reclaim his place among his people? And what will happen to those who get in his way? Fresh off a groundbreaking run on Messiah CompleX, writer Mike Carey and artist Scot Eaton — with help from John Romita Jr., Billy Tan, Greg Land, Brandon Peterson and Mike Deodato — take on mutantkind’s most iconic figures, as well as some of the most important moments in X-Men history. Collecting X-MEN: LEGACY #208-212.
Rated A …$15.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3001-7
